casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Jerry Giovani THOMPSON 24A18-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. January 19, 2018 Erik R. Zimmerman, Attorney at Law, Chapel Hill, for Thompson, Jerry. Robert T. Broughton, Assistant Attorney General, R. Andrew Murray, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 19th of January 2018 by State of NC for Temporary Stay:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 19th of January 2018."
